title: Looking For A Mentor
body:
Hello all,
Ive just hit lvl 30 and i want to take my game to the next level. Im looking for ether a team or experienced player to teach me what i need to know to succeed in ranked and make it to challanger. I mainly play in supp or top but can fill nearly any role. 
Some of the champs i use are: 
{{champion:223}} Tahm Kench lvl5
{{champion:26}} Zilean
{{champion:102}} Shyvana lvl5
{{champion:14}} Sion
{{champion:267}} Nami lvl4
{{champion:4}} Twisted Fate lvl5
{{champion:12}} Alistar

Add me ingame
BloodRaven450

replies.body: You need to abuse op champs every patch and shorten your life by at least 15 years with the rage that will be induced via trolls, fkwits, idiots, on your road to challenger gl

Good to see you're trying to improve. I would not recommend taking advice from anyone less than Platinum. The last thing you want is to learn mistakes.

I'd say you can learn a lot from watching streams of pro-players but if you're serious then coaching is the best option. These sites [here](http://www.lol-coaching.com/coaches.php) and [here](https://%%%%%%%%%%%%%/) are good options, it's not free though :D
I wish I did man, I'm just posting about them because it's what a few of my friends have used.

I don't think the ranking matters that much

Well i am just an unranked player but through looking at your match history the biggest problem that i see is your items. The items that you buy are either wrong or just weird because it has little to no synergy with the champion you are playing. Other than your CS don't look very good too when you are playing a role that isn't support. My advice to you is to go google search the builds for your champion and figure out why people recommend buying an item for a particular champion. Try and figure out what synergy the item has with your champion. If there is anything you don't know just ask me and if i know the answer to it i will help you with it.
